titleStmt.title: A discovery after some search of the sinnes of the ministers, because of which (as we conceive) the Lord is angry, and hath almost made his ministers and ordinances vile and contemptible. / By the brethren of the presbytery at Kilmarnock.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. Presbytery of Kilmarnock.
